channel.title: BBC News, A scandal. Reports tower seven falls 23 minutes b4 it happens
channel.description: http://www.liveleak.com/view?i=49f_1172526096 See. They report tower seven falling 23 minutes before it happened and then their "connection" got disrupted 5 minutes before the tower fell.... Scandal...

item.title: BBC News, A scandal. Reports tower seven falls 23 minutes b4 it happens
item.description:
@00000001 wrote:

You know something funny, 11 September- the two towers.

Lololol. No but, seriously, it was a?an? inside job.

Read full topic

item.title: BBC News, A scandal. Reports tower seven falls 23 minutes b4 it happens
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

I don’t think 9/11 was caused by the government. However I do think the pentagon attack was.

There is no way a plane hit that, the hole was way too small for a plane, you can’t argue that the wings broke off because windows on either side of the hole was intact. Also because if a jet plane really flew that low over the highway, the cars would have been thrown from the force, had to have been a military plane.

Read full topic

item.title: BBC News, A scandal. Reports tower seven falls 23 minutes b4 it happens
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

[quote=“Mopman, post:16, topic:115212”][quote author=daycrawler link=topic=164458.msg1537078#msg1537078 date=1182648531]

I’ve known the whole thing was a hoax for about 2 years now. My dad’s friend gave me a 5 hour long DVD explaining why nothing added up. Here’s a sample, anyone see the hole in the pentagon? SMALL. A 747 would have made it a lot bigger. Plus, it showed pictures in the pentagon, there was WOODEN DESKS. Since when did wood not burn?

Clearly, the person that made that DVD, as well as you, are fucking idiots.

Before you try and spout physics, make sure you have at least a fundamental knowledge of it.

The fuel in the plane is physically impossible to melt the Grade A steel used in the building. Although the steel loses 50% of it’s “melting defense” at like 3000 degrees that airplane fuel wouldn’t have been able to sustain that type of heat for a long enough period of time to burn the steel. Furthermore, The FBI floors of building seven had been completley destroyed before it fell. It also fell in 6.6 seconds( BYU Professor Steven Jones calcualated) and it fell just like a controlled demoltion would if Thermite was used. That good for you mopman?
[/quote]

It fell just like a controller demolition would? No.

It fell like the public/some random guy who made a video decided a “controlled demolition” looked like. I haven’t heard a single controlled demolition expert (read: someone who plans and executes controlled demolitions, not someone in a suit who owns a company that manages them) that says it was a controlled demolition - in fact the opposite, most say there was no way it could be.

Yes, it fell downwards. What do you expect, it’s tonnes of steel. You want it to do a backflip first? Maybe dance the conga on the way down?[/quote]
A physics expert named Steven Jones did extensive research and he talked to many demoltions experts Mopman. If you have time to watch this two hour lecture by him on why phsyics prove that 9/11 was an inside job.
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=964034652002408586

Read full topic
item.source: BBC News, A scandal. Reports tower seven falls 23 minutes b4 it happens

item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

[quote=“daycrawler, post:10, topic:115212”][quote author=Mopman link=topic=164458.msg1536368#msg1536368 date=1182634168]

I’ve known the whole thing was a hoax for about 2 years now. My dad’s friend gave me a 5 hour long DVD explaining why nothing added up. Here’s a sample, anyone see the hole in the pentagon? SMALL. A 747 would have made it a lot bigger. Plus, it showed pictures in the pentagon, there was WOODEN DESKS. Since when did wood not burn?

Clearly, the person that made that DVD, as well as you, are fucking idiots.

Before you try and spout physics, make sure you have at least a fundamental knowledge of it.
[/quote]
The fuel in the plane is physically impossible to melt the Grade A steel used in the building. Although the steel loses 50% of it’s “melting defense” at like 3000 degrees that airplane fuel wouldn’t have been able to sustain that type of heat for a long enough period of time to burn the steel. Furthermore, The FBI floors of building seven had been completley destroyed before it fell. It also fell in 6.6 seconds( BYU Professor Steven Jones calcualated) and it fell just like a controlled demoltion would if Thermite was used. That good for you mopman?[/quote]

It fell just like a controller demolition would? No.

It fell like the public/some random guy who made a video decided a “controlled demolition” looked like. I haven’t heard a single controlled demolition expert (read: someone who plans and executes controlled demolitions, not someone in a suit who owns a company that manages them) that says it was a controlled demolition - in fact the opposite, most say there was no way it could be.

Yes, it fell downwards. What do you expect, it’s tonnes of steel. You want it to do a backflip first? Maybe dance the conga on the way down?

Read full topic

item.title: BBC News, A scandal. Reports tower seven falls 23 minutes b4 it happens
item.dc:creator: @daycrawler daycrawler
item.description:
@daycrawler wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:13, topic:115212”][quote author=daycrawler link=topic=164458.msg1537091#msg1537091 date=1182648853]

I’ve known the whole thing was a hoax for about 2 years now. My dad’s friend gave me a 5 hour long DVD explaining why nothing added up. Here’s a sample, anyone see the hole in the pentagon? SMALL. A 747 would have made it a lot bigger. Plus, it showed pictures in the pentagon, there was WOODEN DESKS. Since when did wood not burn?

Clearly, the person that made that DVD, as well as you, are fucking idiots.

Before you try and spout physics, make sure you have at least a fundamental knowledge of it.

The fuel in the plane is physically impossible to melt the Grade A steel used in the building. Although the steel loses 50% of it’s “melting defense” at like 3000 degrees that airplane fuel wouldn’t have been able to sustain that type of heat for a long enough period of time to burn the steel. Furthermore, The FBI floors of building seven had been completley destroyed before it fell. It also fell in 6.6 seconds( BYU Professor Steven Jones calcualated) and it fell just like a controlled demoltion would if Thermite was used. That good for you mopman?

It’s also weakened by a fucking massive plane going through it, dickhead. No one is saying that the steel was burnt and then the building collapsed…

Oh Congrats. Btw; the report said that the steel melted and then it collapsed. So a plane weakened it. It was designed to shift weight onto the other braces. If anything the top part of where it was hit would have crunched and then fell over to the side. Not straight down like a demoltion. Dickhead.
[/quote]

The planes weight brought it down. Anyway this is old and I really hope this thread dies soon. Because I’m sick and tired of hearing people trying to say that the Twin Towers were demolished on purpose… Why would people want them demolished? How would they know when to set up the demolition if they didn’t know terrorists would strike? How would they set it up without people noticing? If they did know terrorists were going to strike wouldn’t it have looked better for the American Goverment to have stopped them then let them hit the buildings then launch a war on terror?

Anyway I have a headache so I’m done posting here.[/quote]
Do you know anything about America’s history? Apparently Not. We did it to sway public opinion and congress for the invasion into Iraq. Civil War, Abraham Lincoln lied and said that the fort in the southern territory was attacked upprovoked. They were in the south territory. World War 2, Franklin Roosevelt claimed that american passengers on a british carrier were attacked unprovoked and in fact the carrier was carrying American Ammuntion and American Weapons. Vietnam War; we claimed that we we’re attacked unprovoked by the North Vietnam troops and that we we’re attacked twice. Years later we discovered that it was all lies in the pentagon papers and that we were in North Vietnam waters attacking the mainland and unloading south vietnam troops into North Vietnam. We did it to sway public opinion for the war. We have a history to believe it and it’s not unplausiable.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“daycrawler, post:12, topic:115212”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=164458.msg1537081#msg1537081 date=1182648623]

I’ve known the whole thing was a hoax for about 2 years now. My dad’s friend gave me a 5 hour long DVD explaining why nothing added up. Here’s a sample, anyone see the hole in the pentagon? SMALL. A 747 would have made it a lot bigger. Plus, it showed pictures in the pentagon, there was WOODEN DESKS. Since when did wood not burn?

Clearly, the person that made that DVD, as well as you, are fucking idiots.

Before you try and spout physics, make sure you have at least a fundamental knowledge of it.

The fuel in the plane is physically impossible to melt the Grade A steel used in the building. Although the steel loses 50% of it’s “melting defense” at like 3000 degrees that airplane fuel wouldn’t have been able to sustain that type of heat for a long enough period of time to burn the steel. Furthermore, The FBI floors of building seven had been completley destroyed before it fell. It also fell in 6.6 seconds( BYU Professor Steven Jones calcualated) and it fell just like a controlled demoltion would if Thermite was used. That good for you mopman?

It’s also weakened by a fucking massive plane going through it, dickhead. No one is saying that the steel was burnt and then the building collapsed…
[/quote]
Oh Congrats. Btw; the report said that the steel melted and then it collapsed. So a plane weakened it. It was designed to shift weight onto the other braces. If anything the top part of where it was hit would have crunched and then fell over to the side. Not straight down like a demoltion. Dickhead.[/quote]

The planes weight brought it down. Anyway this is old and I really hope this thread dies soon. Because I’m sick and tired of hearing people trying to say that the Twin Towers were demolished on purpose… Why would people want them demolished? How would they know when to set up the demolition if they didn’t know terrorists would strike? How would they set it up without people noticing? If they did know terrorists were going to strike wouldn’t it have looked better for the American Goverment to have stopped them then let them hit the buildings then launch a war on terror?

Anyway I have a headache so I’m done posting here.

Clearly, the person that made that DVD, as well as you, are fucking idiots.

The fuel in the plane is physically impossible to melt the Grade A steel used in the building. It also fell in 6.6 seconds( BYU Professor Steven Jones calcualated) and it fell just like a controlled demoltion would if Thermite was used. That good for you mopman?[/quote]

You seem to have forgotten, on top of all this, a fucking massive plane flew into the building at top speeds? No one is saying the steel got burnt and the building collapsed. The force of the plane going into the building was enough to make it collapse. Also once the plane was in there would have been extra weight, also helping it to collapse. So shut up and maybe try not copying and pasting senseless peoples conspiracy theories off the internet?

liveleak.com

Liveleak.com - VIDEO: BBC WAS HALF AN HOUR TOO EARLY REPORTING ON WTC7 COLLAPSE

On September 11th 2001, BBC World reported at 4:57pm Eastern Time that..


See. They report tower seven falling 23 minutes before it happened and then their “connection” got disrupted 5 minutes before the tower fell…
Scandal…
